snippet.title: 還願DEVOTION - Relaunch on Dec. 18 (Canceled)
snippet.description:
Update on Dec.17:
Hi, we are Red Candle Games,

Earlier GOG has announced on its official Twitter, “After receiving many messages from gamers, we have decided not to list the game in our store.“ Though regretful but we are willing to understand and respect GOG’s decision.

For the players looking forward to Devotion’s re-release, please accept our most sincere apology. This is a difficult predicament to overcome, but we won’t stop striving.

Red Candle Games
---
Original post on Dec. 16:
Hello friends, we want to share with you all that #還願Devotion will be re-released on GOG on  December 18, 2020.

The game will be published by Red Candle Games. The content and the price of the game remain the same, for $16.99 / €13.99 in English, Chinese, Japanese and Korean.

Thank you for your trust and support. We wish you a happy end of the year.
